info.name: F5 BIG-IP - Authentication Bypass
info.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in F5 BIG-IP allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary system commands.

info.name: FortiOS - Out-of-Bound Write
info.description: A critical out-of-bound write vulnerability in FortiOS SSL VPN may allow remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code.

info.name: HTTP/2 Rapid Reset DDoS
info.description: HTTP/2 protocol allows rapid stream reset which can be used for DDoS attacks.

info.name: WordPress XML-RPC Methods Enabled
info.description: WordPress XML-RPC interface is enabled and exposes available methods.

info.name: WordPress User Enumeration
info.description: WordPress user enumeration via REST API is possible.

info.name: WooCommerce Payments - Authentication Bypass
info.description: An authentication bypass in WooCommerce Payments plugin allows unauthenticated users to impersonate arbitrary users.

info.name: Git Config Exposure
info.description: Git configuration file is publicly accessible, potentially exposing sensitive repository information.

info.name: Environment File Exposure
info.description: Environment configuration file is publicly accessible, potentially exposing database credentials and API keys.

info.name: Laravel Debug Mode Enabled
info.description: Laravel application has debug mode enabled exposing sensitive configuration details.

info.name: Citrix Bleed - Information Disclosure
info.description: Sensitive information disclosure in Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway allows buffer overflow.

info.name: Jenkins Dashboard Exposed
info.description: Jenkins CI/CD dashboard is publicly accessible without authentication.

info.name: GitLab Public Repositories
info.description: GitLab instance has publicly accessible repositories.

info.name: Jira Unauthenticated Dashboard Access
info.description: Jira dashboards are accessible without authentication.

info.name: Grafana Default Credentials
info.description: Grafana instance is accessible with default admin:admin credentials.

info.name: Elasticsearch Unauthenticated Access
info.description: Elasticsearch instance is accessible without authentication.

info.name: Open Redirect Detected
info.description: Application is vulnerable to open redirect attacks via URL parameter.

info.name: Reflected XSS
info.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability detected in search parameter.

info.name: CORS Misconfiguration
info.description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing is misconfigured allowing arbitrary origins.

info.name: SSL Certificate Expired
info.description: SSL certificate has expired.

info.name: Missing Security Headers
info.description: Several security headers are missing from the response.

info.name: Missing HSTS Header
info.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security header is not set.

info.name: Directory Listing Enabled
info.description: Directory listing is enabled on the web server exposing file structure.

info.name: PHPInfo Page Exposed
info.description: PHP information page is publicly accessible revealing server configuration.

info.name: WordPress Cron Enabled
info.description: WordPress wp-cron.php is publicly accessible.

info.name: Robots.txt File
info.description: Robots.txt file found with potentially interesting paths.

info.name: PaloAlto PAN-OS Command Injection
info.description: Command injection vulnerability in Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS GlobalProtect feature.

info.name: Confluence - Broken Access Control
info.description: Confluence Data Center and Server allows an external attacker to create unauthorized administrator accounts.

info.name: Docker API Exposed
info.description: Docker daemon API is exposed without authentication.

info.name: Kubernetes Pods Listing
info.description: Kubernetes API server is accessible and allows pod listing.

info.name: AWS Metadata Endpoint Accessible
info.description: AWS EC2 instance metadata endpoint is accessible via SSRF.
